cnd12:2.1.pli: Ye me pubbe viyākaṃsūti yo ca bāvarī brāhmaṇo ye caññe tassa ācariyā, te sakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ sakaṃ khantiṃ sakaṃ ruciṃ sakaṃ laddhiṃ sakaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ sakaṃ adhippāyaṃ byākaṃsu ācikkhiṃsu desayiṃsu paññapiṃsu paṭṭhapiṃsu vivariṃsu vibhajiṃsu uttānīakaṃsu pakāsesunti—

cnd12:3.1.pli: Huraṃ gotamasāsanāti huraṃ gotamasāsanā paraṃ gotamasāsanā pure gotamasāsanā paṭhamataraṃ gotamasāsanā buddhasāsanā jinasāsanā tathāgatasāsanā arahantasāsanāti—

cnd12:4.1.pli: Iccāsi iti bhavissatīti evaṃ kira āsi, evaṃ kira bhavissatīti—

cnd12:5.1.pli: Sabbaṃ taṃ itihītihanti sabbaṃ taṃ itihītihaṃ itikirāya paraṃparāya piṭakasampadāya takkahetu nayahetu ākāraparivitakkena diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā na sāmaṃ sayamabhiññātaṃ na attapaccakkhadhammaṃ kathayiṃsūti—

cnd12:6.1.pli: Sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhananti sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhanaṃ vitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ saṅkappavaḍḍhanaṃ kāmavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ byāpādavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ vihiṃsāvitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ ñātivitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ janapadavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ amarāvitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ parānudayatāpaṭisaṃyuttavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyuttavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ anavaññattipaṭisaṃyuttavitakkavaḍḍhananti—

cnd12:7.1.pli: Nāhaṃ tattha abhiraminti nāhaṃ tattha abhiramiṃ na vindiṃ nādhigacchiṃ na paṭilabhinti—

cnd12:10.4.pli: Dhammanti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, cattāro satipaṭṭhāne cattāro sammappadhāne cattāro iddhipāde pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅge ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ nibbānañca nibbānagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ akkhāhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti—

cnd12:11.4.pli: Taṇhānigghātanaṃ taṇhāpahānaṃ taṇhāvūpasamaṃ taṇhāpaṭinissaggaṃ taṇhāpaṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ.

cnd12:11.5.pli: Munīti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ …pe… saṅgajālamaticca so munīti—

cnd12:12.1.pli: Yaṃ viditvā sato caranti yaṃ viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā.

cnd12:12.2.pli: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā,

cnd12:12.5.pli: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā.

cnd12:12.9.pli: Caranti caranto viharanto iriyanto vattento pālento yapento yāpentoti—

cnd12:13.2.pli: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.

cnd12:13.4.pli: Loketi apāyaloke manussaloke devaloke khandhaloke dhātuloke āyatanaloke.

cnd12:13.5.pli: Tare loke visattikanti loke vesā visattikā loke vetaṃ visattikaṃ sato tareyyaṃ uttareyyaṃ patareyyaṃ samatikkameyyaṃ vītivatteyyanti—

cnd12:16.4.pli: mutanti ghānena ghāyitaṃ jivhāya sāyitaṃ kāyena phuṭṭhaṃ;

cnd12:17.2.pli: Cakkhu loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, sotaṃ loke …pe… ghānaṃ loke … jivhā loke … kāyo loke … mano loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ;

cnd12:17.3.pli: rūpā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, saddā loke … gandhā loke … rasā loke … phoṭṭhabbā loke … dhammā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ;

cnd12:17.4.pli: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, sotaviññāṇaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, ghānaviññāṇaṃ loke … jivhāviññāṇaṃ loke … kāyaviññāṇaṃ loke … manoviññāṇaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, cakkhusamphasso loke … sotasamphasso loke … ghānasamphasso loke … jivhāsamphasso loke … kāyasamphasso loke … manosamphasso loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ;

cnd12:17.5.pli: cakkhusamphassajā vedanā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ … sotasamphassajā vedanā … ghānasamphassajā vedanā … jivhāsamphassajā vedanā … kāyasamphassajā vedanā … manosamphassajā vedanā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ;

cnd12:17.6.pli: rūpasaññā loke … saddasaññā loke … gandhasaññā loke … rasasaññā loke … phoṭṭhabbasaññā loke … dhammasaññā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, rūpasañcetanā loke … saddasañcetanā loke … gandhasañcetanā loke … rasasañcetanā loke … phoṭṭhabbasañcetanā loke … dhammasañcetanā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ;

cnd12:17.7.pli: rūpataṇhā loke … saddataṇhā loke … gandhataṇhā loke … rasataṇhā loke … phoṭṭhabbataṇhā loke … dhammataṇhā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ;

cnd12:17.8.pli: rūpavitakko loke … saddavitakko loke … gandhavitakko loke … rasavitakko loke … phoṭṭhabbavitakko loke … dhammavitakko loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ;

cnd12:17.9.pli: rūpavicāro loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, saddavicāro loke … gandhavicāro loke … rasavicāro loke … phoṭṭhabbavicāro loke … dhammavicāro loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpanti—

cnd12:18.2.pli: Chandarāgoti yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā kāmasineho kāmapariḷāho kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmupādānaṃ kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ.

cnd12:18.3.pli: Chandarāgavinodananti chandarāgappahānaṃ chandarāgavūpasamaṃ chandarāgapaṭinissaggaṃ chandarāgapaṭippassaddhaṃ amataṃ nibbānanti—

cnd12:22.3.pli: Yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.

cnd12:22.4.pli: Aññāyāti aññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā.

cnd12:22.5.pli: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti aññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā.

cnd12:22.8.pli: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti aññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā.

cnd12:23.2.pli: Diṭṭhadhammāti diṭṭhadhammā ñātadhammā tulitadhammā tīritadhammā vibhūtadhammā vibhāvitadhammā.

cnd12:23.4.pli: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti diṭṭhadhammā ñātadhammā tulitadhammā tīritadhammā vibhūtadhammā vibhāvitadhammā.

cnd12:23.5.pli: Abhinibbutāti rāgassa nibbāpitattā nibbutā, dosassa nibbāpitattā nibbutā, mohassa nibbāpitattā nibbutā, kodhassa …pe… upanāhassa … sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārānaṃ santattā samitattā vūpasamitattā nijjhātattā nibbutattā vigatattā paṭippassaddhattā santā upasantā vūpasantā nibbutā paṭippassaddhāti—

cnd12:24.2.pli: Upasantāti rāgassa upasamitattā nibbāpitattā upasantā …pe… dosassa … mohassa … kodhassa … upanāhassa …pe… sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārānaṃ santattā samitattā vūpasamitattā nijjhātattā nibbutattā vigatattā paṭippassaddhattā santā upasantā vūpasantā nibbutā paṭippassaddhāti upasantā.

cnd12:24.4.pli: Sadāti sadā sabbakālaṃ niccakālaṃ dhuvakālaṃ satataṃ samitaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ udakūmikajātaṃ avīcisantatisahitaṃ phassitaṃ purebhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ purimayāmaṃ majjhimayāmaṃ pacchimayāmaṃ kāḷe juṇhe vasse hemante gimhe purime vayokhandhe majjhime vayokhandhe pacchime vayokhandheti—

cnd12:25.2.pli: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.

cnd12:25.5.pli: Tiṇṇā loke visattikanti loke vesā visattikā loke vetaṃ visattikaṃ tiṇṇā uttiṇṇā nitthiṇṇā atikkantā samatikkantā vītivattāti—

cnd13:2.1.pli: Yasmiṃ kāmā na vasantīti yasmiṃ kāmā na vasanti na saṃvasanti na āvasanti na parivasantīti—

cnd13:3.1.pli: Taṇhā yassa na vijjatīti taṇhā yassa natthi na atthi na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti—

cnd13:4.1.pli: Kathaṅkathā ca yo tiṇṇoti kathaṅkathā ca yo tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo nitthiṇṇo atikkanto samatikkanto vītivattoti—

cnd13:5.1.pli: Vimokkho tassa kīdisoti vimokkho tassa kīdiso kiṃsaṇṭhito kiṃpakāro kiṃpaṭibhāgo icchitabboti vimokkhaṃ pucchatīti—

cnd13:8.7.pli: Yasmiṃ kāmā na vasantīti yasmiṃ kāmā na vasanti na saṃvasanti na āvasanti na parivasantīti—

cnd13:10.2.pli: Taṇhāti rūpataṇhā saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā dhammataṇhā.

cnd13:10.4.pli: Taṇhā yassa na vijjatīti taṇhā yassa natthi na atthi na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati, pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti—

cnd13:11.1.pli: Kathaṅkathā ca yo tiṇṇoti kathaṅkathā vuccati vicikicchā.

cnd13:11.4.pli: Kathaṅkathā ca yo tiṇṇoti kathaṅkathā ca yo tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo nitthiṇṇo atikkanto samatikkanto vītivattoti—

cnd13:12.1.pli: Vimokkho tassa nāparoti natthi tassa aparo vimokkho.

cnd13:15.1.pli: Nirāsaso so uda āsasānoti nittaṇho so, udāhu sataṇho rūpe āsīsati, sadde …pe…

cnd13:15.31.pli: diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbe dhamme āsīsati sādiyati pattheti piheti abhijappatīti—

cnd13:16.2.pli: Paññāṇavā soti paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī.

cnd13:16.3.pli: Uda paññakappīti udāhu aṭṭhasamāpattiñāṇena vā pañcābhiññāñāṇena vā micchāñāṇena vā taṇhākappaṃ vā diṭṭhikappaṃ vā kappeti janeti sañjaneti nibbatteti abhinibbattetīti—

cnd13:17.4.pli: Atha vā aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko.

cnd13:17.6.pli: saddhādhanaṃ sīladhanaṃ hiridhanaṃ ottappadhanaṃ sutadhanaṃ cāgadhanaṃ paññādhanaṃ satipaṭṭhānadhanaṃ sammappadhānadhanaṃ iddhipādadhanaṃ indriyadhanaṃ baladhanaṃ bojjhaṅgadhanaṃ maggadhanaṃ phaladhanaṃ nibbānadhananti.

cnd13:17.7.pli: Tehi anekavidhehi dhanaratanehi aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko.

cnd13:17.8.pli: Atha vā sakko pahu visavī alamatto sūro vīro vikkanto abhīrū acchambhī anutrāsī apalāyī pahīnabhayabheravo vigatalomahaṃsotipi sakko.

cnd13:17.9.pli: Muniṃ ahaṃ sakka yathā vijaññanti sakka yathāhaṃ muniṃ jāneyyaṃ ājāneyyaṃ vijāneyyaṃ paṭivijāneyyaṃ paṭivijjheyyanti—

cnd13:18.2.pli: Tanti yaṃ pucchāmi yaṃ yācāmi yaṃ ajjhesāmi yaṃ pasādemi.

cnd13:18.3.pli: Viyācikkhāti ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehi.

cnd13:21.1.pli: Nirāsaso so na ca āsasānoti nittaṇho so.

cnd13:21.5.pli: diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbe dhamme nāsīsati na icchati na sādiyati na pattheti na piheti nābhijappatīti—

cnd13:22.2.pli: Paññāṇavāti paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī.

cnd13:22.3.pli: Na ca paññakappīti aṭṭhasamāpattiñāṇena vā pañcābhiññāñāṇena vā micchāñāṇena vā taṇhākappaṃ vā na kappeti diṭṭhikappaṃ vā na kappeti na janeti na sañjaneti na nibbatteti nābhinibbattetīti—

cnd13:23.2.pli: Munīti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ …pe… saṅgajālamaticca so muni.

cnd13:23.3.pli: Evampi todeyya muniṃ vijānāti todeyya, evaṃ muniṃ jāna paṭijāna paṭivijāna paṭivijjhāti—

cnd13:24.2.pli: Akiñcananti rāgakiñcanaṃ dosakiñcanaṃ mohakiñcanaṃ mānakiñcanaṃ diṭṭhikiñcanaṃ kilesakiñcanaṃ duccaritakiñcanaṃ.

cnd13:24.3.pli: Yassetāni kiñcanāni pahīnāni samucchinnāni vūpasantāni paṭippassaddhāni abhabbuppattikāni ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāni, so vuccati akiñcano.

cnd13:25.1.pli: Akiñcanaṃ kāmabhave asattanti akiñcanaṃ puggalaṃ kāme ca bhave ca asattaṃ alaggaṃ alaggitaṃ apalibuddhaṃ nikkhantaṃ nissaṭaṃ vippamuttaṃ visaññuttaṃ vimariyādikatena cetasā viharantanti—
